mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT (POIN_ID, USER_ID, POIN_AMOUNT, POIN_TYPE_CODE, MESSAGE) VALUES (SEQ_POINT.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{poin_amount}, #{poin_type_code}, #{message})
mapper.select:
SELECT P.POIN_ID, P.POIN_AMOUNT, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODE C WHERE C.CODE_ID = P.POIN_TYPE_CODE) AS POIN_TYPE, P.MESSAGE, P.POIN_DATETIME FROM POINT P WHERE P.USER_ID = #{user_id}
AND #{start_date} <= TO_CHAR(POIN_DATETIME, 'YYYYMMDD')
